title: Config defaultModel not respected without CLI flag
description: When config.json has `defaultModel: kiro`, Ralph still uses opus unless -K flag is passed. The config value should be the default when no model flag is specified.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Verify config.json defaultModel value is read correctly in ralph.zsh
Fix RALPH_DEFAULT_MODEL assignment to use config value as primary default
Test: `ralph 5` with config `defaultModel: kiro` should show 'Model: kiro'
Test: `ralph 5 -S` should override config and show 'Model: sonnet'
Run CodeRabbit review - must pass (or create BUG if unfixable)
Commit: fix: BUG-001 respect config defaultModel without CLI flag
